data.name: First Flame
data.description: Place your first Furnace to begin your journey in metalworking.

data.name: Iron Forged Future
data.description: Unlock the strength of iron with your first iron toolkit.

data.name: The Smith's Rhythm
data.description: Construct an Anvil and use it to make your first metal plate.

data.name: Rubble Revolution
data.description: Build a Crusher and turn solid deposits into the foundation of progress.

data.name: Golden Alloy
data.description: Smelt a Brass Ingot, the alloy that will reinforce your endeavors.

data.name: Power at Hand
data.description: Equip yourself with a Hand Drill or Chainsaw, tools that redefine efficiency.

data.name: Purifying Spin
data.description: Assemble a Magnetic Cleaner to increase the yield from your ores.

data.name: Cast Iron Conquest
data.description: Create a Cast Iron Ingot, a symbol of industrial might.

data.name: Peak Performance
data.description: Upgrade to an Advanced Hand Drill or Advanced Chainsaw with Cast Iron.

data.name: Crafting Prodigy
data.description: Unlock the door to endless creativity with your first plank

data.name: Timber Architect
data.description: Lay the first log of your dream home. Your journey into cozy living starts with the warmth of wood.

data.name: Stonemason's Pride
data.description: With the placement of your first stone wall, you lay the groundwork for indestructible dreams.

data.name: Interior Designer
data.description: Each piece of furniture turns a house into a home, cozy and welcoming.
